mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dadian ( id, browseversion, channel, ctime, height, ip, mac, note, os, padpcmobile, page, pageadids, pagedocids, pagetype, pageid, sendwindowsevent, ua, uuid, width ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{browseversion}, #{channel}, #{ctime}, #{height}, #{ip}, #{mac}, #{note}, #{os}, #{padpcmobile}, #{page}, #{pageadids}, #{pagedocids}, #{pagetype}, #{pageid}, #{sendwindowsevent}, #{ua}, #{uuid}, #{width} )
